title: Python Conditionals
description: Practice using if, elif, and else statements to control the flow of your Python program based on conditions.
constraints: Use at least one if, one elif, and one else statement.
Include a condition with a comparison operator (>, <, ==, etc.).
Handle at least three possible outcomes.
starterCode:
x = int(input("Enter a number: "))
# Write your if, elif, else conditions below
hints: if checks the first condition, elif checks others, else covers remaining cases.
